0.name: Karen
0.text: AI Initializing... Press SPACE to continue or ESC to skip dialogue.

1.name: Karen
1.text: Initialization complete. Onboard IRIS class AI, designation KAREN, ready for duty. Good morning, Captain.

2.name: Captain
2.text: Good morning, Karen. What do we have today?

3.name: Karen
3.text: Today, we will be doing a practice run against demo ships.

4.name: Karen
4.text: Use the directional arrow keys to move. Press SPACE to fire. Press ESC to open the pause menu.

5.name: Karen
5.text: Pick up red health kits to restore HP and green pills to gain money.

6.name: Karen
6.text: Since this a demo, the demo ships endlessly spawn until you press ESC to pause and quit.

7.name: Karen
7.text: Be sure to give feedback if you want to fly real missions in the future.
